Package com.jimmyselectronics.svenden

Class ReusableBagDispenser

java.lang.Object
com.jimmyselectronics.AbstractDevice<ReusableBagDispenserListener>
com.jimmyselectronics.svenden.ReusableBagDispenser
public class ReusableBagDispenser extends AbstractDevice<ReusableBagDispenserListener>
Represents the reusable-bag dispenser.
Author:
Jimmy's Electronics LLP

  • Constructor Details

    • ReusableBagDispenser

      public ReusableBagDispenser(int capacity)
      Basic constructor permitting the capacity to be set.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The maximum number of bags that the dispenser can contain.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentSimulationException - if capacity ≤0.

  • Method Details

    • getCapacity

      public int getCapacity()
      Obtains the maximum capacity of the dispenser.
      Returns:
      The maximum capacity.

    • load

      public void load(ReusableBag... bags) throws OverloadException
      Adds the indicated bags to the dispenser. Causes a "bags loaded" event to be announced. Requires power.
      Parameters:
      bags - The bags to be added.
      Throws:
      OverloadException - if the new total number of bags would exceed the capacity of the dispenser.

    • unload

      public ReusableBag[] unload()
      Removes all the bags from the dispenser. Causes an "out of bags" event to be announced. Requires power.
      Returns:
      The bags formerly in the dispenser.

    • dispense

      public ReusableBag dispense() throws EmptyException
      Dispenses one bag to the customer. Causes a "bag dispensed" event to be announced. May cause an "out of bags" event to also be announced, if the dispensed bag is the last one in the dispenser. Requires power.
      Returns:
      The dispensed bag.
      Throws:
      EmptyException - if the dispenser contained no bags when this method was called.
